column1: Condado is a city located in the state of Pernambuco
column2: Brazil. Located  at 69.3 km away from Recife
column3: capital of the state of Pernambuco. Has an estimated (Ibge 2009) population of 24.403 inhabitants.

column1: Boundaries - Itambé   (N);  Nazaré da Mata and Itaquitinga   (S);  Goiana   (E);  Aliança   (W)
The main economic activities in Condado are based in agribusiness
column2: especially sugarcane and livestock such as cattle and chickens.
